item.title: NZ: Payroll - Some users are unable to load timesheets

item.title: AU Tax - Some users are being logged out
item.content:encoded:
[High] - AU Tax Access Issue

Some Australian customers are being logged out when trying to access Xero Tax in Xero. This is a critical issue that our team is urgently investigating. We will provide updates as soon as possible. Summary: Identified issue impacting customers experiencing log out issues in AU Tax. Investigating with urgency.

Mar 6, 07:06 UTC
Identified - We have identified what is impacting some customers who are experiencing log out issues in AU Tax.

This is our top priority and we will update you as soon as we can.

Investigating - We are aware Australian customers trying to access Xero Tax in Xero are being logged out. Our team is investigating this with urgency.

item.title: Global: Xero - Some users experiencing errors in Xero
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Network Connectivity Issues

Summary: Customers are experiencing general errors and slowness in Xero due to poor network connectivity. Our technical team is investigating the issue with urgency.

Mar 4, 19:02 UTC
Resolved - Our team has resolved the issue that was causing errors in Xero. We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.

Our technical team identified this was caused by poor network connectivity and has restored service.

Mar 4, 18:49 UTC
Investigating - We are aware some customers are experiencing general errors and slowness in Xero. Our team is investigating this with urgency.

Status Last Reviewed: 6:49pm UTC

item.title: HMRC system maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major System Maintenance for MTD VAT Service Summary: HMRC is undergoing scheduled system maintenance for the MTD VAT service from 6am to 11:00pm UTC on Sunday 10th of March 2024, which may cause platform downtime for customers accessing the VAT registration, claim VAT enrolment, and VAT view and change services.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 06:00 - 23:00 UTC

Mar 4, 15:41 UTC
Scheduled - HMRC is undergoing scheduled system maintenance for the MTD VAT service from 6am to 11:00pm UTC on Sunday 10th of March 2024. During this time, customers may be unable to access the VAT registration, claim VAT enrolment, and VAT view and change services. Please refer to the HMRC website for further information: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/vat-online-service-availability-and-issues/vat-online-service-availability-and-issues

item.title: Global: Reporting - Slowness accessing custom reports
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Outage: Custom Report Loading in Xero

Some customers were unable to load custom reports in Xero due to a product release causing the feature to become unavailable. The issue has been resolved by rolling back the release.

Mar 4, 04:52 UTC
Resolved - Our team has resolved the issue impacting some customers trying to load custom reports in Xero. We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.

A product release caused this feature to become unavailable. We've rolled back the release and services are back to normal.

item.title: IRD System Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major System Outage for IRD

IRD have just advised us that there will be an outage overnight tonight to perform system maintenance between 9pm and 2am NZT. During this time NZ Tax will be intermittently unable to connect to IRD services. Summary: The IRD will experience a major system outage due to scheduled maintenance, impacting NZ Tax services intermittently.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 28, 08:00 - 13:00 UTC

Feb 27, 22:49 UTC
Scheduled - IRD have just advised us that there will be an outage overnight tonight to perform system maintenance between 9pm and 2am NZT.

During this time NZ Tax will be intermittently be unable to connect to IRD services.

Our team has resolved the issue causing customers to receive error messages when trying to upload or download Files in Xero. This was caused by a technical issue with one of our servers. This was due to a technical issue with one of our servers. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Resolved - Our team has resolved the issue causing customers to receive error messages when trying to upload or download Files in Xero. This was caused by a technical issue with one of our servers. We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.

item.content:encoded:

item.content:encoded:
Feb 18, 22:39 UTC
Resolved - Our team was aware of an issue causing customers to experience degraded performance in XPM on Saturday 5:30 am UTC. This has now been resolved. We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.

This issue was caused due to a higher than normal amount of requests to our system which resulted in performance issues.

We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.

Our team has identified the cause of this issue and are in the process of implementing a fix.

We apologise for the inconvenience.
